data.quote: I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center.
data.author: Kurt Vonnegut

data.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
data.author: Spider-Man

data.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
data.author: Chris Grosse

data.quote: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it’s holy ground. There’s no greater investment.
data.author: Stephen Covey

data.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
data.author: Julie Andrews
